title: We're Your Girlfriends
itunes:title: We're Your Girlfriends
description:
Today on the show Charlamagne had the privilege to interview the cast of girlfriends where they spoke about the ending of the show, having a reunion and being part of the culture. Moreover, Charlamagne gave "Donkey of the Day" to an old man who criticized a football player for his dreads and Angela helped some listeners out during "Ask Yee". 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
